images.copyright: Reliefs in the ancient Persian city of Persepolis, Iran (© Ozbalci/Getty Images)
images.title: Wow, what a relief!
images.caption: International Archaeology Day
images.desc: It's International Archaeology Day, an opportunity to discover more about our past and different societies through ancient sites and artifacts. Across the world, events such as scavenger hunts, lectures, and interactive workshops will be held to mark the day and awaken your inner Indiana Jones.
